title: Pear and honey muffins
ingredients: ['100g (4 oz) plain flour', '100g (4 oz) wholemeal flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '225g (8 oz) tinned pears, sliced', '225g (8 oz) natural yoghurt', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '5 tablespoons honey', '1 egg, beaten']
